content: Same as Title # I changed the theme of the site. I am wondering if anyone would be interested in visiting this site. Much better things to do ig. I tried adding comments to artices but failed. These previous 3 days i have spent too much time in this site, maybe i should doing other things. I was trying to Learn Qt to help me contribute to KDE. Maybe i should start again. Also since i am in a society (CP Domain) in my college, i should start doing leetcode. Codechef was simple just #include, int main()… but in this there’s class and something written i don’t understand this. Have to spend some time in this. Hope i find exciting things to work on and if time is with me that i find all. Thanks for listening (if someone did).
title: Changes

content:
About Me # Wherever i go they want an intro. Well, hello! My name is Suryansh. You must have guessed it by the site name. I am not pro at anything but just finding where i can find the spark. I like trying everything (anything which requires a laptop or mobile), i am not a very talkative person. I get very shy. But since even if you judge me by my writing, i dont mind. My current interests are or what i am doing right now is to create this site , make it more beautiful (i hope it does), trying to do leetcode. I actually tried to do some CP problems get my rating up but i don’t think i am good at this. I like maths but thinking how to solve the problems seemed exhausting. I think maybe some people are gifted , consistency matters too, I am currently in a college (1st year currently), can’t say i am enjoying . Nevertheless i am starting to do leetcode more as coding is required thing i hope it’s easier than codeforces. Placements too are based on your leetcode rank/score, idk. Wish me Luck!
Thanks for listening to me.
title: Intro
